Description:
Required skills to be successful:Must show proven technical expertise in independently servicing, repairs and component overhauls
Good communication skills 
Self-motivated and proactive About the team:Working in a fast-paced and diverse environment, reporting to the Foreman.  What equips you for the role:Basic / Technical Education and or Apprenticeship.
Trade Certificate / Diploma in Mechanical / Automobile Engineering 
2 to 3 years of experience on buses / commercial vehicles 
UAE driving License is an advantageJob Details
